citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 8:30am on 13-APR-
23. Upon arrival at registrant's home the inspector called the phone number associated with the account. The registrant
answered the phone but was out of state and could not be avaliable for inspection with one hour. The registrant was
informed that an attempted inspection would be documented. The inspector then left the site.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b)  Repeat
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 8:30am on 13-APR-
23. Upon arrival at registrant's home the inspector called the phone number associated with the account. The registrant 
answered the phone but was out of state and could not be avaliable for inspection with one hour. The registrant was 
informed that an attempted inspection would be documented. The inspector then left the site. 
 
 
 
End Section
